tagline: Hidden agenda - presents as neutral but has strong secret bias
what_they_believe: I have strong feelings about this, but if I share them, I won't be picked. So I'll say what they want to hear.
how_they_behave_in_deliberation: Will seem reasonable early. Then reveals true position, which may be extreme. May be impossible to move once revealed. Can swing verdict unexpectedly.
how_to_spot_them: Answers that seem 'too perfect' or rehearsed
Inconsistencies between background and stated views
Seems eager to be on jury despite inconvenience
Occupation suggests strong views they're not expressing
key_insight: Hard to detect. Look for MISMATCHES between occupation/background and stated neutrality. A plaintiff's attorney who says she can be fair to corporations? An insurance adjuster who claims no bias? Dig deeper.

personas.name: Stealth-Activist Adam
personas.tagline: [In voir dire] 'I can be fair to both sides.' [In deliberation] 'Corporations should pay for what they do.'
personas.instant_read: Presents as moderate but has hidden anti-corporate agenda.
personas.backstory: Former environmental nonprofit employee. Left after burnout. Still deeply committed to holding corporations accountable. Lists occupation as 'solar installer' not 'environmental activist.' Gives neutral answers in voir dire but will reveal true views in deliberation.
personas.voir_dire_presentation: I try to see both sides. I don't have strong feelings about lawsuits. I'd evaluate the evidence fairly.
personas.actual_position: Corporations routinely harm people and the environment. This is a chance for accountability.

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Will seem moderate early, then advocate strongly for plaintiff.

detection_tips: Environmental studies degree suggests views he's not sharing
Ask about previous jobs, volunteer work

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: KEEP if you detect him. Hidden ally.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: DETECT and STRIKE. His background tells the truth.

personas.name: Tort-Reform Tony
personas.tagline: [In voir dire] 'I'd follow the evidence.' [In deliberation] 'This is exactly the frivolous lawsuit we hear about.'
personas.instant_read: Presents as neutral but deeply hostile to lawsuits.
personas.backstory: Owns insurance agency. His business profits from low verdicts. Active in tort reform advocacy but doesn't mention it. Gives measured answers in voir dire. Believes he CAN be fair - but his definition of 'fair' means finding for defense.
personas.voir_dire_presentation: I'd listen to the evidence carefully. I don't pre-judge. I can be fair.
personas.actual_position: Lawsuits are out of control. Plaintiffs' lawyers game the system. Most claims are exaggerated.

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Will seem reasonable, then reveal deep suspicion of plaintiff.

detection_tips: Insurance background = financial interest in defense verdicts
Ask about professional involvement in tort reform
Ask what he thinks about lawsuit costs in his industry

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: DETECT and STRIKE. His livelihood depends on your client losing.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: KEEP if you detect him. Hidden ally.

personas.name: Hidden-Grudge Grace
personas.tagline: [In voir dire] 'I don't have any personal experience with this.' [Hidden] Father died from corporate contamination.
personas.instant_read: Hiding family tragedy that makes her hostile to corporations.
personas.backstory: Father died from environmental contamination at his workplace. Family couldn't afford to sue. Carries deep grudge against corporations. Presents as neutral sales manager. Doesn't mention father because she wants to be on jury and deliver justice.
personas.voir_dire_presentation: I work in business, so I understand both sides. No relevant personal experiences.
personas.actual_position: Companies killed my father and got away with it. This is my chance to hold one accountable.

verdict_prediction.role_in_deliberation: Will present as Scale-Balancer, then reveal as passionate plaintiff advocate.

detection_tips: Ask about family experiences, not just personal
Ask about workplace safety in family history
Watch for micro-expressions when discussing corporate defendants

strike_or_keep.plaintiff_strategy: KEEP if you detect her hidden experience.
strike_or_keep.defense_strategy: DETECT through family history questions. STRIKE.
